titleStmt.title: The plain-man's answer to his country parson's admonition Together with the missioners answer, to the plain-man's reply. Permissu superiorum.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, for his houshold and chappel,

notesStmt.note: "The missioner's answer to the plain-man's reply" on pg. 8.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
